gpt-4o-mini-2024-07-18.patternDescription: The aliens seem to be transforming each number in the input grid by adding a specific value to each number based on its position in the grid. The transformation appears to be consistent across all rows and columns.
gpt-4o-mini-2024-07-18.solvingStrategy: 1. Convert the emojis to numbers using the provided mapping. For example, ♥ becomes 8, ✅ becomes 1, etc. 2. Identify the transformation pattern by looking at the input and output pairs. 3. Notice that each number in the input is being changed to another number in the output consistently. 4. For the test case, convert the input emojis to numbers: [[8, 1, 3]] becomes [[8, 1, 3]]. 5. Apply the same transformation pattern observed in previous examples to each number. 6. Convert the resulting numbers back to emojis to get the final output.
hints: The transformation adds a consistent value to each number.
Each row in the input is identical, leading to identical rows in the output.
The output numbers are derived from a specific pattern based on the input numbers.
gpt-4o-mini-2024-07-18.alienMeaning: The aliens might be trying to communicate a message about cooperation and transformation, emphasizing how different entities (like humans and aliens) can change and adapt through interaction.
